channel.title: Project MSP Recruiting!
channel.description:
[size=10pt]PROJECT MSP ROSTER AND APLICATION[/size]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/7359/ownageriteej3.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/2962/client2sg1.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Project Msp Stands for Project Moparscapeplace. We have already started the client now it includes Dark bow, Rune defender, All Skillcapes, Dragon Full Helm, dragon boots, And Much Much More. We are looking for all these jobs listed below. please apply if you are interested![/b]
In-Game Moderator
Brain-Stormer
Server Coders
Testers
Forum Makers
Client Coders/ WEbclient
Cache Editors (if possible)
[b]Ingame Administrator[/b] -Army_Life -Zakc20 -Playermany2
[b]Workers:[/b] Forum Moderators -Si Force -Open -Open
Ingame Moderators -Bmxr4c3r709 -open -open
Server Advertiser's -igottapet -Torgash -Open -Open
Brainstormers -igottapet -open
Server Coders -zackc20 -playermanny2 -Monkey Wacko -Aftereffect -Ectophantom (yeah. we added 1 more space for you. It is my fault really, i didnt update the list enough, but you are still on the team)
Back-Up Coders -Rswinteller -Open
Testers -igottapet -Rswinteller -Open
Forum Makers -Army_Life -open
Client Coders/ Webclients -Playermanny2 -Aftereffect -open
Cache Editors -open -open
[b]Application For Job :[/b] Job Wanted : Experience: In Job: Any Other Reasons To Hire You?/ Proof: Time On Computer Each day
Thank You For all Post In Advance, and plz dont flame.

item.dc:creator: @igottapet igottapet
item.description:
@igottapet wrote:

Monkey Wacko, you have been accecpted to the MSP team as a Server Coder, but declined as a Server Admin and Forum Mod. Please talk to XArmyLifeX on AIM to learn more about what your job is, and to be officialy part of the MSP team.

Aftereffect, you have been accecpted to the MSP team as a coder, both server and client! Please talk to XArmyLifeX on AIM to learn more about what your job is, and to be officialy part of the MSP team.

Hocklm, you have been declined. If you would like to try again, ask XArmyLifeX on AIM.

Ectophantom, you have been accecpted to the MSP team as a Server Coder. Please talk to XArmyLifeX on AIM to learn more about what your job is, and to be officialy part of the MSP team.

NOTE: before you accecpted are offical, you NEED to talk to XArmyLifeX for a quiz on your job.

item.title: Project MSP Recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

name:Pwnm30rdi3 or monkey wacko
Job?: Sever coder and server admin or forum admin/mod
exp in skill?:Great at coding!! A lot I’m admin on many Servers (yarnovascape, 80% homemade source by me and 2 other friends, admin on zunescape,mod on 3+other servers and a coder for project ds but there done so i need a new project) and i help servers grow as long as forums im great with advertising i worked for an advertising company for 8 months! I have a quad core linux server for server hosting currently not inuse and i can use it for your server!
Time Zone: eastern United States
Time on computer each day: 5-7 hours
Msn: coolmanawesome1@hotmail.com
Age:17
proof:I’m also good with graphics and i love to code I’m 17 almost 18 I’m very reliable and i can get you a dedicated website host from go daddy if needed with 100g storage and 1000g bandwidth and much more!

Look at all this proof below vvvvvvvv

Made this site: www.excg2.com

Ive made tons of other forums im just too lazy too post them all!

I’m staff here! http://yarnovascape.ipbfree.com/index.php?act=idx

Im also co-owner on a starting naruto fan site at www.gonaruto.net/forums

coder/mod:http://projectds.smfforfree3.com/index.php

Was admin here and co-owner but another admin de -admined me: http://www.zunescape.ipbfree.com/

I used to be a big part of this community but they renamed and changed websites
http://www.zetageneration.com/index.php

And im a verteran: chemicalscape.com

And i’m a mod, web designer, and server coder for www.projectunknown.org

AND NOW A CODER HERE http://www.conventioninvention.com/
